page.title: 09Shops and Services.
page.content: All the shops in the district are small when compared with shops in a town. There are two inns in the area,the Blue Anchor at Fraddon and the Queen and Railway at St.Columb Road.They both serve food.There is a chipshop called the Port and Starboard at the junction of the A30.A restaurant on the other side of the road is called Mrs.Beeton's Kitchen.People travel a long way to eat there. There are two small supermarkets - VG Stores at Queens Corner(opposite the Port and Starboard) and the Co op at St.Columb Road, There are several other small food shops,plus an ironmongers,butcher,T.V. dealer(B.& O.dealer),insurance office, ladies hairdresser and an antique shop.
